If an equation of the form
0x + 0y = k \hphantom{blank}(k\ne 0)
is obtained as a linear combination of the equations in a system, the system is inconsistentinconsistent.

If an equation of the form
0x + 0y = 0
is obtained as a linear combination of the equations in a system, the system is dependentdependent.
